text: aur kuchh log aise bhee hain jo (zabaan se to) kah dete hain ki ham khuda par eemaan lae phir jab unako khuda ke baare mein kuchh takaleef pahunchee to vah logon kee takaleef dehee ko azaab ke baraabar thaharaate hain aur (ai rasool) agar tumhaare paas tumhaare paravaradigaar kee madad aa pahunchee aur tumhen phateh huee to yahee log kahane lagate hain ki ham bhee to tumhaare saath hee saath the bhala jo kuchh saare jahaann ke dilon mein hai kya khuda bakhoobee vaaqiph nahin (zarur hai)
